script:
1). It's my treat.
Oh, thank you! 
I prefer chocolate.
Yes, it is.
2). Does Chandler still work for Livingstone Inc.?
Yes, he did.
He didn't work there.
I don't think so. 
3). Which vendor do we use for break-room supplies?
I'll get someone to fix it.
I'm not sure. 
We don't use them anymore.
